Name: PlayClaw 7 - Game Overlays, Recording and Streaming
About the game: PlayClaw 7 gives your cool in-game overlays and provides smooth game video recording and streaming. You can record and stream your gameplay, Windows desktop, web videos. PlayClaw will help you with its great in-game overlays, streaming and recording widgets. You can track your hardware real time information on a game screen without second display. You can configure every piece of the software right in a game without annoying alt-tab switches! PlayClaw 7 features Smooth game capture up to 200fps In-game scene editor and software configuration Native capture available for DirectX 9, 10, 11, 12, OpenGL and Vulkan Overlays available: FPS, Webcam, Capture statistics, Timers, Clock, Stopwatch, Teamspeak 3, Window capture, Web browser (streaming alerts) H.264 encoding with hardware acceleration (Intel QuickSync, NVidia Encoder, AMD AMF encoder) Streaming to YouTube, Twitch and other RTMP services Cool Time-Shift recording feature Fast Windows desktop capture mode H.264 software encoder is available Up to 16 audio sources Realtime audio preprocessing engine Adjustable video recording frame rate and size Compatible with PunkBuster, Valve Anti Cheat, EasyAntiCheat and BattlEye Planned features Various overlays like System information and much more Overlays effects like Chroma key, Color key, scroll, etc. Multiple display support Capture screenshots
